main event: An observer, a 13-year-old, and others sighted two objects in the sky that resembled planets or a meteor, observed over Fall River, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The observer noted that the lights moved at high speeds and stopped abruptly., The observation lasted for about 25 minutes., The lights emitted no sound, and did not conform to any known aircraft., There was a previous sighting by the same observer on February 27, 1963., The weather conditions were clear during the observation.
sighted object: two lights resembling planets or a meteor
